NK039(ti)028:1: // sh+ai mam d+ae bi ba sh+na p+au dza bi d+hi sha tru d+hu li pra stam /
NK039(ti)028:2: bi dza ha ra ti sma ///
NK039(ti)028:3: dpal ldan lha mo nag mo mchod pa'i cho ga dgra bgegs rdul brlag bzhugs so //
NK039(ti)028:4: dpal chen he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK039(ti)028:6: yi dam gyi bya ba brten nas /
NK039(ti)028:7: mdun du yamh'oda du zhu ba las /
NK039(ti)028:8: rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbyibs gru bzhi /
NK039(ti)028:11: de'i nang gi dbus su ramh'oda du zhu ba las /
NK039(ti)028:12: me'i dkyil 'khor dbyibs rlung dang 'dra ba ste /
NK039(ti)028:13: de'i nang du b+h+r+aumh'oda du zhu ba las thod pa'i
NK039(ti)028:14: gzhal yas khang dbyibs gru bzhi rgya che che la
NK039(ti)028:15: 'phangs mtho ba / thod khang gi 'og gzhi dur khrod sa gzhis gang bar bsgom /
NK039(ti)028:16: rang nyid yi dam gyi lte ba nas /
NK039(ti)028:17: yi dam gyi lte ba nas /
NK039(ti)028:19: thod khang gi nang du phog /
NK039(ti)028:23: rna ba gnyis krog chung byas pa /
NK039(ti)028:24: zhing lpags kyi stan bstad pa /
NK039(ti)028:25: sga'i snga ru srin po'i ya thod la byas pa /
NK039(ti)028:26: man mkhal la phyi ru byas pa /
NK039(ti)028:27: lpag pas sga g.yog byas pa /
NK039(ti)028:28: sogs pas sga log byas pa /
NK039(ti)028:29: sbrul nag gi gong thag dang glo nan byas pa /
NK039(ti)028:30: zhing chu ngu gnyis la smad byas pa'i /
NK039(ti)028:31: skra mdud smad thung la yar btags pa /
NK039(ti)028:32: lag pa gnyis 'phyang ba smed byil byas pa lta bu'o //
NK039(ti)028:33: rgyu ma'i mthur srab byas pa /
NK039(ti)028:34: mjug ma'i rtsa ba g.yas g.yon gnyis na mig gnyis yod pa /
NK039(ti)028:35: de'i sga gong du yi ge ramhciga 'od du zhu ba las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du bsgom /
NK039(ti)028:36: de nas yi dam gyi thugs ka nas yi ge mahnaga mo cig spros /
NK039(ti)028:37: bong bu'i sga gong du nyi ma'i thog tu bab /
NK039(ti)028:39: ral gri yu ba mar bstan pa /
NK039(ti)028:41: gzhung sa rang la bstan pa /
NK039(ti)028:42: so phud yu mtshams na nyi ma'i thog tu mahnaga mo gcig yod par bsgom /
NK039(ti)028:43: de nas ral gri las 'od zer 'phros te /
NK039(ti)028:44: 'jig rten gyi mkha' 'gro ma thams cad la phog /
NK039(ti)028:45: thams cad lha mo nag mo nyid du gyur /
NK039(ti)028:46: kun tshul 'dus ral gri la thim /
NK039(ti)028:48: ru ru ro ru tri tsa pa la a shug+me ma h'u ma b+h+yo dza dzah zhes brjod pas /
NK039(ti)028:49: lha mo nag mo sku gyur te /
NK039(ti)028:50: sku mdog nag mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum pa /
NK039(ti)028:52: phyag g.yas ral gri nam mkhar 'phyar ba /
NK039(ti)028:53: g.yon pas ne'u le'i rkyal bu rin po che'i bkang ba sta zur g.yon na bsnams pa /
NK039(ti)028:54: bong bu la phyir log tu bcibs pa /
NK039(ti)028:55: mi'i thod pa yob chen la bardzisa pa /
NK039(ti)028:56: dbu skra kham nag gyen du thor tsug mtho ba /
NK039(ti)028:57: thur du yang pa la bshal ba /
NK039(ti)028:58: ral pa'i skra mtshams nas thod pa skam po bcu drug gis phreng bas rgyan pa'o //
NK039(ti)028:59: spyi bo'i gtsug na zla ba tshes brgyad pa dang /
NK039(ti)028:60: ral pa'i skra mtshams na rma bya'i mdangs kyis brgyan pa /
NK039(ti)028:61: snyan g.yas pa'i steng nas gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'i thog tu /
NK039(ti)028:62: seng ge dkar mo g.yu'i ral pa can gcig gis snan cha byas pa /
NK039(ti)028:63: g.yon pa'i snyan cha sbrul nag la byas pa /
NK039(ti)028:64: sku stod la zhing lpags kyi na bza' gsol ba
NK039(ti)028:65: sku smad kyi snam bu lta bu'i g.yas phyogs su
NK039(ti)028:66: smyug ma'i re lde la byas pa /
NK039(ti)028:67: g.yon pa glang po che'i ko rlon la byas pa /
NK039(ti)028:68: stag lpags kyis sham thabs la sbrul nag gis ske rag bcings pa /
NK039(ti)028:69: thod rlon phreng ba se ral khar thogs pa /
NK039(ti)028:70: lte bar nyi ma shar ba'o //
NK039(ti)028:71: bong bu'i kha ngur zhabs su skem ma chu srin mgo can /
NK039(ti)028:72: sku mdog dmar nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
NK039(ti)028:73: g.yas kyi bong bu'i kha khrid byas pa /
NK039(ti)028:74: g.yon na sbrul zhags bsnams pa /
NK039(ti)028:75: zhing lpags kyi sham thabs can /
NK039(ti)028:76: sbrul nag gi se ra khar thog pa'o //
NK039(ti)028:77: de nas 'khor ma mo bdun dang /
NK039(ti)028:81: dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang 'khor ma mo stong yod pa tsam mos par bya'o //
NK039(ti)028:82: lha tshogs de dag thams cad kyi spyi bor zla
NK039(ti)028:83: ba'i steng du dkar po mgrin par pad+ma'i steng du
NK039(ti)028:84: +aahdamara po / thugs kar nyi ma'i steng du h'u mthing nag go //
NK039(ti)028:85: de nas ye shes pa spyan 'dren pa ni /
NK039(ti)028:86: rang gi thugs ka nas 'od zer 'phros te /
NK039(ti)028:87: ri rab byang shar mtshams nas lha mo 'dir bskyed
NK039(ti)028:88: pa 'dra ba gtso 'khor gzhal yas dang bcas pa
NK039(ti)028:90: kye ma cig lha mo dpal lha mo //
NK039(ti)028:91: dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis //
NK039(ti)028:92: ma cig lha mo spyan 'dren no //
NK039(ti)028:93: byang shar mtshams nas gshegs su gsol //
NK039(ti)028:94: ma cig lha mo dpal lha mo //
NK039(ti)028:95: ma 'tshubs ma'i steng du 'khyil pa'i dbus na bzhugs //
NK039(ti)028:96: bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar ba dang //
NK039(ti)028:97: rlung nag lta bu'i sum ma ni //
NK039(ti)028:98: sku yi gnas te rgyan gyis mchog /
NK039(ti)028:99: drag shul khyab 'gro glog gi bang //
NK039(ti)028:100: bsam pa tsam gyi gnas su phyin //
NK039(ti)028:101: ma de yi tshul du gshegs su gsol //
NK039(ti)028:102: ru ru ro ru tri tsa pa la a shug+me ma h'u ma b+h+yo dza dzah dzahmh'u bam ho /
NK039(ti)028:106: nag mo khrag 'thung rdo rje ral pa can //
NK039(ti)028:107: dbang chen rdo rje thog dang ser chen 'bebs //
NK039(ti)028:108: khams gsum sgrol mdzad srid gsum rtsad nas gcod //
NK039(ti)028:109: ral pa bsigs pas khams gsum kun tu kheb //
NK039(ti)028:110: mche ba gtsigs pas dgra bgegs zhal du 'dren //
NK039(ti)028:111: ma lus dbang du bsdud la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK039(ti)028:113: gtor ma byin gyis brlabs pa gsal gdab ni /
NK039(ti)028:115: ma cig lha mo dpal lha mo //
NK039(ti)028:116: ma khyed la gzugs kyi mchod pa 'bul ba ni //
NK039(ti)028:117: lha mo'i gzugs dang klu mo'i gzugs //
NK039(ti)028:118: bzang ba'i gzugs dang brjid pa'i gzugs //
NK039(ti)028:119: kha dog sna tshogs mdzes pa'i gzugs //
NK039(ti)028:120: cir yang gyur pa'i gzugs la sogs //
NK039(ti)028:121: ma cig spyan la thim gyur cig /
NK039(ti)028:122: thugs mchog dam pa mnyes gyur cig /
NK039(ti)028:123: dngos grub dam pa rtsal du gsol //
NK039(ti)028:124: ma cig lha mo dpal lha mo //
NK039(ti)028:125: ma khyed la phyi yi mchod pa 'bul ba ni //
NK039(ti)028:126: me tog chu skyes thang skyes rnam pa sna tshogs dang //
NK039(ti)028:127: bzang zhing 'bras bu phun sum tshogs //
NK039(ti)028:128: ma cig sku la thim gyur cig /
NK039(ti)028:129: thugs mchog dam pa mnyes gyur cig /
NK039(ti)028:130: dngos grub dam pa stsal du gsol //
NK039(ti)028:131: ma cig lha mo dpal lha mo //
NK039(ti)028:132: ma khyed la sgra yi mchod pa 'bul ba ni //
NK039(ti)028:133: pi wam gling bu mkhar ba'i rnga //
NK039(ti)028:134: rdza rnga cang til gan+de dung //
NK039(ti)028:135: cha lang sil snyan la sogs te //
NK039(ti)028:136: ril bu rnga gshang rnam pa sna tshogs dang //
NK039(ti)028:137: glu dbyangs tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra //
NK039(ti)028:138: ma cig snyan la thim gyur cig /
NK039(ti)028:139: thugs mchog dam pa mnyes gyur cig /
NK039(ti)028:140: dngos grub dam pa stsal du gsol //
NK039(ti)028:142: ma cig lha mo dpal lha mo //
NK039(ti)028:143: ma khyed la dri yi mchod pa 'bul ni //
NK039(ti)028:144: a ka ru dang du ru ka /
NK039(ti)028:145: sha ka ra dang lnga sbyar bas //
NK039(ti)028:146: tsan+da dkar dmar dri zhim spos //
NK039(ti)028:147: ma cig shangs la thim gyur cig /
NK039(ti)028:148: thugs mchog dam pa mnyes gyur cig /
NK039(ti)028:149: dngos grub dam pa stsal du gsol //
NK039(ti)028:150: ces phyi'i mchod pa rnams kyi mchod nang gi mchod pa gtor ma bdud rtsi rgya mtsho chen po /
NK039(ti)028:151: sha rus khrag gsum dang bcas pa rnams lha mo 'khor dang bcas pa rnams gsol bar bsam zhing /
NK039(ti)028:153: ma cig lha mo dpal lha mo //
NK039(ti)028:154: rdo rje lha mo nag mo che //
NK039(ti)028:155: ma cig thugs dam zhal zas snod //
NK039(ti)028:156: p+aa la b+han+da bcud yangs pa'i //
NK039(ti)028:158: bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir //
NK039(ti)028:159: rdzong dang dkag bzlog nag po che //
NK039(ti)028:160: gsol lo rol cig dgyes par mdzod //
NK039(ti)028:161: ma cig lha mo dpal lha mo //
NK039(ti)028:162: ma cig thugs dam zhal zas ni //
NK039(ti)028:163: bsad pa'i sha dang myos pa'i chang //
NK039(ti)028:164: bsreg pa'i gsur dang rlon pa'i sha //
NK039(ti)028:165: btsos pa'i sha dang khu ba khrag /
NK039(ti)028:166: nang rol glo snying mkhal mar bcas //
NK039(ti)028:167: gsol lo rol cig dgyes par mdzod //
NK039(ti)028:168: ma cig lha mo dpal lha mo //
NK039(ti)028:169: ma khyed la yid bzhin mchod pa 'bul ba ni //
NK039(ti)028:170: 'bras bu lnga yi tshom bu bdud rtsi dang //
NK039(ti)028:171: ko ro tsa na dang ni sprin chen thal chen dang //
NK039(ti)028:172: ma h+aa mam sa rak+ta tsit+ta ba su ta //
NK039(ti)028:173: ma cig zhal du thim gyur cig /
NK039(ti)028:174: thugs mchog dam pa mnyes gyur cig /
NK039(ti)028:175: dngos grub dam pa rtsal du gsol //
NK039(ti)028:176: gsol lo rol cig dgongs shig sa ma y+aa //
NK039(ti)028:177: ru ru ro ru be tish+tha ba d+h+aa pi tsa
NK039(ti)028:178: pa la a shug me h'u b+h+yo kha ram kha
NK039(ti)028:179: hi / 'byung po'i phung po la kha ram kha hi /
NK039(ti)028:180: dgra bgegs 'di yi dbang po rnams lnga la kha ram kha hi /
NK039(ti)028:181: ra rgya ram pa la kha hi /
NK039(ti)028:183: de nas sman gyis mchod do //
NK039(ti)028:185: rang byung gdod nas dag pa yi //
NK039(ti)028:186: rtsa brgyad stong la sbyar ba'i sman //
NK039(ti)028:187: rigs lnga dam tshig lnga yi dngos //
NK039(ti)028:188: ye shes lnga rdzogs grub pa'i rdzas //
NK039(ti)028:189: rgyu lngas sems can kun sgrol ba'i //
NK039(ti)028:190: dug lnga sel ba'i bdud rtsi 'di //
NK039(ti)028:191: ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad dang //
NK039(ti)028:192: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen dang //
NK039(ti)028:193: khro bo'i rgyal po mtha' yas dang //
NK039(ti)028:194: ma mo mkha' 'gro tshogs chen dang //
NK039(ti)028:195: lha dang lha mo gsang ba'i bdag /
NK039(ti)028:196: thugs dam dbyings nas bskul ba'i mchog /
NK039(ti)028:197: 'di ni sngon gyi dam tshig go //
NK039(ti)028:198: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
NK039(ti)028:199: sku gsung thugs kyi ngang nyid la //
NK039(ti)028:200: bdag gi dad pas 'bul lags nas //
NK039(ti)028:201: bzhes te kun tu dgyes mdzod la //
NK039(ti)028:202: phul ba'i dngos grub bdag la rtsol //
NK039(ti)028:203: na mahsarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa ar+g+ham pra tits+tsha ho /
NK039(ti)028:204: rdo rje nag mo mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal //
NK039(ti)028:205: dus gsum sangs rgyas kun dang spyod yul gcig pa'i yum //
NK039(ti)028:206: khams gsum log par lta ba thams cad dbyings su sgrol //
NK039(ti)028:207: srid gsum za bar byed pa'i yum rnams la //
NK039(ti)028:208: rnam dag bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul //
NK039(ti)028:209: thugs rjes brtse dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol //
NK039(ti)028:210: na mahsarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa sarba pany+tsa a mri ta la kh+aa hi /
NK039(ti)028:212: dbyings phyug dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma //
NK039(ti)028:213: 'gro ba thugs rjes skyong phyir yum gyi tshul //
NK039(ti)028:214: mtshan ma'i skyon spangs sku mdog nag mor ston //
NK039(ti)028:215: drag shul spyod phyir gcer bu srin mo'i tshul //
NK039(ti)028:216: lha chen 'dul phyir sdang mig rol pa bsigs //
NK039(ti)028:217: skye shi rtsad gcod za byed mche ba gtsigs //
NK039(ti)028:218: 'khor ba ljags la ldag phyir rkan sgra ldeg /
NK039(ti)028:219: dug lnga sel phyir rma bya'i mdangs kyi brgyan //
NK039(ti)028:220: byang chub sems ldan spyi gtsug zla rgyas gsal //
NK039(ti)028:221: dam tshig bya ra mdzad phyir spyan rtsa dmar //
NK039(ti)028:222: lha min g.yul ngo bzlog phyir mdung dang ru mtshon bsnams //
NK039(ti)028:223: srid gsum bsgral phyir shes rab ral gri bsnams //
NK039(ti)028:224: dgra bgegs 'dul phyir nad kyi rkyal pa thog /
NK039(ti)028:225: dbul ba sel phyir ne'u le rkyal bu bsnams //
NK039(ti)028:226: 'chi bdag bzlog phyir snyan g.yas seng ges brgyan //
NK039(ti)028:227: gdug pa 'dul phyir klu dbang snyan chas brgyan //
NK039(ti)028:228: 'byung po sngangs phyir thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan //
NK039(ti)028:229: rnal 'byor skyong phyir dril chen sgra snyan sgrogs //
NK039(ti)028:230: klu chen 'dul phyir sbrul gyi ske raka bcings //
NK039(ti)028:231: bdud dpung dpa' skum zhing lpags gos su gyon //
NK039(ti)028:232: theg chen don ldan glang chen ko rlon gsol //
NK039(ti)028:233: dpa' gtum bstan phyir stag gi sham thabs mdzad //
NK039(ti)028:234: smon lam mi 'dor sku smad re ldes skris //
NK039(ti)028:235: mdzes par bya phyir rkang sgrogs lcags las byas //
NK039(ti)028:236: nyon mongs mtsho skam lte ba nyi mas brgyan //
NK039(ti)028:237: srin po 'dul phyir chibs su bong bu bcibs //
NK039(ti)028:238: stong gsum bgrod phyir 'tshubs ma'i klong na bzhugs //
NK039(ti)028:239: dur khrod gnas phyir g.yog 'khor mang pos bskor //
NK039(ti)028:240: 'khor ba 'jigs tshe sems can sdug bsngal rnams //
NK039(ti)028:241: lha mo khyed kyi zhal du thams cad zhugs gyur te //
NK039(ti)028:242: brtse ldan thugs rjes 'gro kun bskyangs nas kyang //
NK039(ti)028:243: byang chub spyod pa'i thar lam ston mdzad pa //
NK039(ti)028:244: lha mo mthu chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK039(ti)028:245: de nas phrin las bcol tshig ni /
NK039(ti)028:247: mchod sbyin gyi gtor ma rgya chen po 'di mchod cing 'bul ba'i gnas ni /
NK039(ti)028:248: dpal ldan lha mo nag mo /
NK039(ti)028:254: 'khor ma sring rgya mtsho'i tshogs dang bcas pa la /
NK039(ti)028:255: dam rdzas bka'i gtor ma rgyan gyi mchod pa 'di bzhes la /
NK039(ti)028:256: sdang bar byed pa'i dgra thul cig /
NK039(ti)028:257: gnod par byed pa'i bgegs chom gcig /
NK039(ti)028:258: bar chad kyi rkyen bzlog cig /
NK039(ti)028:259: bsgral ba'i zhing bcu rdul du rlog cig /
NK039(ti)028:260: bdag cag rnal 'byor pa'i basamapa yid bzhin du 'grub par mdzad du gsol /
NK039(ti)028:261: ma b+h+yohdzahlasa byung ba ma mo'i tshogs //
NK039(ti)028:262: gcan spyang bong dril 'byung ba bzhi la bcibs //
NK039(ti)028:263: dpal ldan lha mo ri ti mched bzhi sogs //
NK039(ti)028:264: 'khor bcas ma mo'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK039(ti)028:266: thugs kar ye shes sems dpa' lha mo go'u ri
NK039(ti)028:267: ma sngon mo g.yas zhing dbyug g.yon thod khrag bsnams
NK039(ti)028:268: pa / de'i thugs kar zla ba dang ral gri'i
NK039(ti)028:269: so yu mtshams nas ma nag mo gcig bsgom pa
NK039(ti)028:270: yi ge bco lnga pas skor ba'o //
NK039(ti)028:272: ru ru ro ru tri tsa pa la a shug me ma h'u ma b+h+yo dza dzah zhes sogs /
NK039(ti)028:274: tshar nas ye shes sems dpa' gshegs mi dgos /
NK039(ti)028:275: 'khor rnams snyem ma bcas pa ma mo'i thugs kar bsdus /
NK039(ti)028:276: bong bu ma mo la thim /
NK039(ti)028:277: ma mo bdag gi thugs kar thim /
NK039(ti)028:278: gzhal yas khang me dpung gi dmigs pa gshegs /
NK039(ti)028:279: smon lam bskul ba dang bdag skabs dang sbyar /
NK039(ti)028:280: bla ma kahthoga pa'i phyag len ltar /
